relnotes.name: Content Access Framework for DRM
relnotes.purpose: Framework support for Digital Rights Management (DRM), enables policy based management of loading and access to restricted content by applications and Multimedia plugins.

defect.title: Make Security Test Suites Run Standalone

relnotes.defect: Make Security Test Suites Run Standalone

defect.title: CAF: Resolving should handle leaves in CAgentManager construction

relnotes.defect: The leave from AgentManagerL is trapped and ignored.

defect.title: Improve RTA performance by disabling flogger calls in release build

relnotes.defect: Disabled flogger calls in release builds to improve RTA performance.

defect.title: The cafu.def should contains the same number of ordinals as the MCL ones

relnotes.defect: cafu.def file updates to ordinals for EABI and BWINS to maintain BC

deliverystep.name: CR1440: Crypto Services: Additional CAF support for retrieval of Cover Art for OMA DRM files

cr.title: Additional CAF support for retrieval of Cover Art for OMA DRM files

deliverystep.cr: Additional CAF support for retrieval of Cover Art for OMA DRM files

defect.title: Add agent specific base enum to TEventMask in caftypes.h in caf2 component.

relnotes.defect: added an enum to TEventMask.

defect.title: CAF2 ConstructL does not check for success of allocation.

relnotes.defect: CAF2 ConstructL does check for success of allocation.

defect.title: Filename Policy non-conformance generates build warnings

relnotes.defect: changed the case in the caf2 streaming component.

defect.title: Wrong case of

relnotes.defect: Fixed case in MRP file.

cr.title: Additional CAF support for OMA DRM Content Differentiation

defect.title: Can't cancel CAF asynchronous read

relnotes.defect: Added an interface for canceling an asynchronous request in CData together with default implementation.

deliverystep.name: Security - Alignment of CBR and System Model components

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model components

deliverystep.preq: Modified the ipr category of reccafconfig.

defect.title: Error in CSupplier::ImportFileL

relnotes.defect: Removed dead code from CSupplier::ImportFileL

defect.title: tjmioom test fails in MCL

relnotes.defect: Fixed OOM handling by revising connection management to the SystemAMS server

defect.title: CAF - RFile interfaces do not document requirement for shared sessions

relnotes.defect: Fixed documentation for RFile & related calls - it did not state that RFs sessions should be shared.

defect.title: Security test tswi\searchtags.pl fails because of 2 caf files

relnotes.defect: Added @file tag to the following files: caf2\inc\patchdata.h, caf2\source\cafutils\mimefieldanddata.h.

defect.title: Device crashes if URL saved after TV streaming is played from video tab

relnotes.defect: Fixed defect where recognizer raised a panic on a long URI

defect.title: CAF Resolver - error handling needs to be revised

relnotes.defect: Revised error handling in CAF, so that if the agent leaves in either DoRecognizeL or IsRecognizedL, we will not trap the error. Potential behaviour change was approved in BR2123.1

defect.title: Elena + DRM V1 + Embedded MMS: It is possible to select and send a FL-Audio c...

relnotes.defect: KErrInUse is propagated now if an agent returns it in Resolve

defect.title: Caf introduced Lint errors into the Security subsystem

relnotes.defect: Added various minor fixes to fix lint errors.

defect.title: Media gallery - "File cannot be moved" from phone to memory card

relnotes.defect: CF32AgentManager::RenameFile was rewritten to support operation across drives

defect.title: SWSV_633_91_R24_A01_MEDIA_IMG-IG-2: Picture gallery crash when try to open co...

relnotes.defect: F32 Agent returns system wide error when recognising mime types for given content instead of failing silently

defect.title: Scoping change to streamableptrarray causes build failures

relnotes.defect: Modified code so that it compiles with CW3.0 compiler as well as CW3.1.1

defect.title: name space collision due to using namespace in published partner header

relnotes.defect: Removed using namespace ContentAccess; from public header and inl files

defect.title: CAF attributes do not support all OMA DRM v2 DCF fields

relnotes.defect: Added EContentVersion attribute to TAttribute enum, and EContentLocation and ERightsIssuerURI to TStringAttribute enum, to ensure CAF more fully supports the OMA DRM v2 specification.

deliverystep.name: Filename policy changes
deliverystep.preq: Updating the component source files to comply with the Symbian filename policy.

relnotes.minorchange: Symbian OS v9.3 component branched from common codeline

defect.title: RTA panics when CContent::GetStringAttributeSet() is called

relnotes.defect: Fixed defect where RTL CContent::GetStringAttributeSet() funciton in RTA was causing panic. Added test code to verify against regression.

defect.title: CImportFile API capability requirements incorrect (CAF2)

relnotes.defect: Removed the capability requirement on users of the CImportFile API.

defect.title: CAF agents cannot be installed via SIS packages

relnotes.defect: The compile-time CAF_LOAD_POST_PRODUCTION_AGENTS macro relocated to ROM build-time to allow licensees to enable this feature with out recompiling the CAF component.
relnotes.minorchange: Minor Change - Moved source code from the security subsystem to the Syslibs subsystem.
